content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

The weather conditions in northern France have been worse than any year we can remember. The camps spread out across the area have become swamps, and the conditions for the refugees living here are atrocious.

People who are survivors of war, torture and trafficking, deserve to be treated with humanity and dignity. We are doing all we can to support them, but we are increasingly overwhelmed by the demand for humanitarian aid, and we need your help.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” disable_element=”yes” background_color=”custom” custom_background_color=”#ffffff” lg_spacing=”margin_bottom:20″ md_spacing=”margin_bottom:20″ sm_spacing=”margin_bottom:20″ xs_spacing=”margin_bottom:20″][vc_column width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][tm_image align=”center” animation=”none” image=”19402″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text el_class=”donate-textbox”]

A Complete Set of Clothes – £13

A donation of £13 will buy a new hoodie, pair of joggers, t-shirt, socks and underwear for someone who rarely gets to wash or change their clothes.

[/vc_column_text][tm_button_group][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fuk.virginmoneygiving.com%2Fdonation-web%2Fcharity%3FcharityId%3D1018115%26donationAmount%3D13%26utm_source%3Dextbtn%26utm_campaign%3Ddonatebtn|title:Donate|target:%20_blank|” animation=”none”][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fuk.virginmoneygiving.com%2Fdonation-web%2Fcharity%3FcharityId%3D1018115%26donationAmount%3D13%26frequencyType%3DM%26utm_source%3Dextbtn%26utm_campaign%3Ddonatebtn|title:Donate%20Monthly|target:%20_blank|” animation=”none” color=”secondary”][/tm_button_group][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][tm_image align=”center” animation=”none” image=”19558″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text el_class=”donate-textbox”]

A Pair of Boots – £20

A donation of £20 will buy a refugee a pair of waterproof walking boots, as permanently wet feet lead to foot rot and worse when you are sleeping rough.

[/vc_column_text][tm_button_group][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fuk.virginmoneygiving.com%2Fdonation-web%2Fcharity%3FcharityId%3D1018115%26donationAmount%3D20%26utm_source%3Dextbtn%26utm_campaign%3Ddonatebtn|title:Donate|target:%20_blank|” animation=”none”][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fuk.virginmoneygiving.com%2Fdonation-web%2Fcharity%3FcharityId%3D1018115%26donationAmount%3D20%26frequencyType%3DM%26utm_source%3Dextbtn%26utm_campaign%3Ddonatebtn|title:Donate%20Monthly|target:%20_blank|” animation=”none” color=”secondary”][/tm_button_group][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” lg_spacing=”margin_bottom:20″ md_spacing=”margin_bottom:20″ sm_spacing=”margin_bottom:20″ xs_spacing=”margin_bottom:20″][vc_column width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][tm_image align=”center” animation=”none” image=”19559″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text el_class=”donate-textbox”]

A Warm Winter Coat – £25

A donation of £25 will buy a winter coat to keep someone dry and warm throughout the cold winter months.

[/vc_column_text][tm_button_group][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fuk.virginmoneygiving.com%2Fdonation-web%2Fcharity%3FcharityId%3D1018115%26donationAmount%3D25%26utm_source%3Dextbtn%26utm_campaign%3Ddonatebtn|title:Donate|target:%20_blank|” animation=”none”][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fuk.virginmoneygiving.com%2Fdonation-web%2Fcharity%3FcharityId%3D1018115%26donationAmount%3D25%26frequencyType%3DM%26utm_source%3Dextbtn%26utm_campaign%3Ddonatebtn|title:Donate%20Monthly|target:%20_blank|” animation=”none” color=”secondary”][/tm_button_group][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][tm_image align=”center” animation=”none” image=”19399″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text el_class=”donate-textbox”]

A Smartphone – £50

A donation of £50 will buy a smartphone to provide critical contact to families and those closest to you who may be in danger back home in conflict zones.

[/vc_column_text][tm_button_group][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fuk.virginmoneygiving.com%2Fdonation-web%2Fcharity%3FcharityId%3D1018115%26donationAmount%3D50%26utm_source%3Dextbtn%26utm_campaign%3Ddonatebtn|title:Donate|target:%20_blank|” animation=”none”][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fuk.virginmoneygiving.com%2Fdonation-web%2Fcharity%3FcharityId%3D1018115%26donationAmount%3D50%26frequencyType%3DM%26utm_source%3Dextbtn%26utm_campaign%3Ddonatebtn|title:Donate%20Monthly|target:%20_blank|” animation=”none” color=”secondary”][/tm_button_group][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-lg” lg_spacing=”padding_bottom:20″ md_spacing=”padding_bottom:20″ sm_spacing=”padding_bottom:20″ xs_spacing=”padding_bottom:20″][tm_image align=”center” animation=”none” image=”19402″][vc_column_text el_class=”donate-textbox”]

A Complete Set of Clothes – £13

A donation of £13 will buy a new hoodie, pair of joggers, t-shirt, socks and underwear for someone who rarely gets to wash or change their clothes.

[/vc_column_text][tm_button_group align=”center”][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fuk.virginmoneygiving.com%2Fdonation-web%2Fcharity%3FcharityId%3D1018115%26donationAmount%3D13%26utm_source%3Dextbtn%26utm_campaign%3Ddonatebtn|title:Donate|target:%20_blank|”][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fuk.virginmoneygiving.com%2Fdonation-web%2Fcharity%3FcharityId%3D1018115%26donationAmount%3D13%26frequencyType%3DM%26utm_source%3Dextbtn%26utm_campaign%3Ddonatebtn|title:Donate%20Monthly|target:%20_blank|” color=”secondary”][/tm_button_group][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-lg” lg_spacing=”padding_bottom:20″ md_spacing=”padding_bottom:20″ sm_spacing=”padding_bottom:20″ xs_spacing=”padding_bottom:20″][tm_image align=”center” animation=”none” image=”19558″][vc_column_text el_class=”donate-textbox”]

A Pair of Boots – £20

A donation of £20 will buy a refugee a pair of waterproof walking boots, as permanently wet feet lead to foot rot and worse when you are sleeping rough.

[/vc_column_text][tm_button_group align=”center”][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fuk.virginmoneygiving.com%2Fdonation-web%2Fcharity%3FcharityId%3D1018115%26donationAmount%3D20%26utm_source%3Dextbtn%26utm_campaign%3Ddonatebtn|title:Donate|target:%20_blank|”][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fuk.virginmoneygiving.com%2Fdonation-web%2Fcharity%3FcharityId%3D1018115%26donationAmount%3D20%26frequencyType%3DM%26utm_source%3Dextbtn%26utm_campaign%3Ddonatebtn|title:Donate%20Monthly|target:%20_blank|” color=”secondary”][/tm_button_group][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-lg” lg_spacing=”padding_bottom:20″ md_spacing=”padding_bottom:20″ sm_spacing=”padding_bottom:20″ xs_spacing=”padding_bottom:20″][tm_image align=”center” animation=”none” image=”19559″][vc_column_text el_class=”donate-textbox”]

A Warm Winter Coat – £25

A donation of £25 will buy a winter coat to keep someone dry and warm throughout the cold winter months.

[/vc_column_text][tm_button_group align=”center”][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fuk.virginmoneygiving.com%2Fdonation-web%2Fcharity%3FcharityId%3D1018115%26donationAmount%3D25%26utm_source%3Dextbtn%26utm_campaign%3Ddonatebtn|title:Donate|target:%20_blank|”][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fuk.virginmoneygiving.com%2Fdonation-web%2Fcharity%3FcharityId%3D1018115%26donationAmount%3D25%26frequencyType%3DM%26utm_source%3Dextbtn%26utm_campaign%3Ddonatebtn|title:Donate%20Monthly|target:%20_blank|” color=”secondary”][/tm_button_group][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-lg” lg_spacing=”padding_bottom:20″ md_spacing=”padding_bottom:20″ sm_spacing=”padding_bottom:20″ xs_spacing=”padding_bottom:20″][tm_image align=”center” animation=”none” image=”19399″][vc_column_text el_class=”donate-textbox”]

A Smartphone – £50

A donation of £50 will buy a smartphone to provide critical contact to families and those closest to you who may be in danger back home in conflict zones.

[/vc_column_text][tm_button_group align=”center”][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fuk.virginmoneygiving.com%2Fdonation-web%2Fcharity%3FcharityId%3D1018115%26donationAmount%3D50%26utm_source%3Dextbtn%26utm_campaign%3Ddonatebtn|title:Donate|target:%20_blank|”][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fuk.virginmoneygiving.com%2Fdonation-web%2Fcharity%3FcharityId%3D1018115%26donationAmount%3D50%26frequencyType%3DM%26utm_source%3Dextbtn%26utm_campaign%3Ddonatebtn|title:Donate%20Monthly|target:%20_blank|” color=”secondary”][/tm_button_group][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” disable_element=”yes” background_color=”custom” box_shadow=”0 20px 30px #ccc” custom_background_color=”#ededed” lg_spacing=”margin_top:20;margin_right:20;margin_bottom:20;margin_left:20″ md_spacing=”margin_top:20;margin_right:20;margin_bottom:20;margin_left:20″ sm_spacing=”margin_top:20;margin_right:20;margin_bottom:20;margin_left:20″ xs_spacing=”margin_top:20;margin_right:20;margin_bottom:20;margin_left:20″][vc_column width=”1/2″ lg_spacing=”padding_top:20;padding_right:20;padding_bottom:20;padding_left:20″ md_spacing=”padding_top:20;padding_right:20;padding_bottom:20;padding_left:20″ sm_spacing=”padding_top:20;padding_right:20;padding_bottom:20;padding_left:20″ xs_spacing=”padding_top:20;padding_right:20;padding_bottom:20;padding_left:20″][vc_column_text]

Urgent Appeal

French authorities have conducted the largest eviction of refugees in Calais since 2016, destroying tents, sleeping bags, possessions and food.

Our volunteers are searching the area for those left behind. We have found people sleeping on bare tarmac, or wandering for days, hungry, dehydrated and exhausted.

£12 buys a tent to provide shelter for two people sleeping rough
£6 provides a sleeping bag to keep a vulnerable person warm through the night
£4 buys a healthy snack pack for an individual

A recurring donation is the ultimate thing you can do to help refugees. Recurring donations enable us to respond immediately to crisis and emergencies without the need to fundraise first.

[/vc_column_text][tm_button_group align=”center”][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fcare4calais.enthuse.com%2Fcf%2F117d%2Femergency-appeal%23!%2F|title:Donate%20now|target:%20_blank|” align=”center” animation=”none”][/tm_button_group][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ lg_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″ md_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″ sm_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″ xs_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:10;padding_right:10;padding_bottom:10;padding_left:10″][tm_image align=”center” animation=”none” image=”20762″ lg_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″ md_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″ sm_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0″ xs_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″][/vc_column][/vc_row]

We have found people sleeping on bare tarmac, or wandering for days, hungry, dehydrated and exhausted. £12 buys a tent to provide shelter for two people sleeping rough £6 provides a sleeping bag to keep a vulnerable person warm through the night £4 buys a healthy snack pack for an individual A recurring donation is the ultimate thing you can do to help refugees. Recurring donations enable us to respond immediately to crisis and emergencies without the need to fundraise first.
